project_abstract.cdata: Proposed changes in the Loan Agreement for Croatia Pension System Investment Project include: introducing a new spending category - payments for labor restructuring (severance package) of $3,167,000; reduction of goods category by $698,000; net reduction of the category consultant services, training and audit by $2,467,000, of which $2,993,000 due to cancellation of training of retrenched Croatian Institute for Pension Insurance (CIPI) staff; reduction of front-end fee by $2,000 to align the fee actually collected ($273,000 - 1 percent of the project total) with the fee indicated in the loan agreement. The first three proposed changes are due to the restructuring of the CIPI component. Project development objectives, outcomes and scope of the Project remain unchanged.
